ELVIS COLE AND JOE PIKE RETURN TO TAKE ON THE JAPANESE MOB...

Hired by a hotel magnate to locate a priceless Japanese manuscript,
L.A. private eye Elvis Cole encounters the notorious Yakuza, the
Japanese mob, and is drawn into a game of sexual obsession,
amorality, and evil.
